> ::Fliq::
> 
> The grab caught Fliq complete unaware, the Maximal
> ending up looking 
> at Strafe as he sat up. Fliq's hand moves his gun,
> pointing the 
> barrel at Strafe.
> 
> "My name is Fliq," Fliq says as best as he could
> right now. "I'm a 
> Maximal. We found you in a crash site and repaired
> you, you're in our 
> base."

Strafe had to grin.

"You actually think that after all I've just been
through that I'm intimidated by your little gun? I
don't think so."

Strafe used his other hand to grab Strafe's gun hand,
pointing it elsewhere.

"Maximal."

He thought. "So I owe my life to a housepet?" 

He begun to laugh, then pulled Strafe to him,
grinning....then setting the smaller Maximal down,
letting go and sitting up. The seeker jet thorougly
dwarfed Fliq (Not moding. Optimus Prime himself stood
at about 20 feet tall in robot mode).

"Housepet or not, I do owe you my life. So in return,
I give you my word that I am no threat to you or your
allies and that unless I am physically provoked, no
harm will come to any of you. I am Strafe, Lieutenant
of the Death's Hand Division commanded by Colonel
Neotron."

He bowed.

"Or at least I used to be."

He checked his joints, tranformed into jet mode and
back again, transforming his twin blasters to the
double-barreled hand-wielded blaster he normally used
and transformed them back to his arms where they
normally resided. He could either use them as a
double-barreled blaster or as twin blasters mounted on
each arm (like on Starscream) depending on the
situation.  He seemed to calm down instantly.

"I must say...Fliq, you did a wonderful job repairing
me...and since I can't exactly rejoin my Decepticon
comrades and since I made sure Scud and Razor couldn't
report back to Colonel Neotron back on Cybertron..."

He chuckled with a hint of sadistic glee, then
narrowed his eyes at Fliq. 

"I may as well stay here awhile. So tell me,
housepet...are defectors welcome?"

(tag Fliq...or Iron Raptor or whoever)
